hero.titulo_principal: Strategy + Design for companies looking to scale without competing on price.
hero.descripcion: I build the visual and strategic architecture that turns ordinary businesses into market authorities. I don’t design to impress. I design to position and convert.

servicios.descripcion: Strategic audit to uncover revenue leaks and hidden growth opportunities.
puntos: Identity Audit: Does your brand project authority or confusion?
Offer Analysis: Does your positioning justify your pricing?
Action Plan: Clear roadmap to scale with structure.

servicios.descripcion: Complete positioning, identity and conversion system. Your infrastructure to sell high-ticket offers.
puntos: Premium Visual Identity aligned with perceived value.

servicios.descripcion: Your external Creative & Strategy Director. Visual production + traffic + performance management.
puntos: High-end visual assets focused on conversion.
Ads & Performance Management: continuous ROAS optimization.

proyectos.descripcion_corta: From zero to National TV. Total construction of an e-commerce brand.

detalle.descripcion_larga:
**The Challenge:** Differentiate a Gymshark/YoungLA resale business in a sea of informality. The goal was not just to "sell clothes", but to structure a serious and scalable business, capable of managing inventory and customers professionally from day 1.

**The Solution:** Disciplined execution and bootstrapping. Operating since 2023, as **Founder & Operator**, I manage the entire value chain: from direct import to final delivery. I developed the niche's only E-commerce platform with real-time inventory by size, centralized customer management (CRM) and orders in **Airtable** to not miss a single sale, and constantly reinvested capital.

**The Result:** Organic and sustained growth. I managed to scale inventory from **$0 to +$5,000 USD** (active) without external investment. Today, Gymrat Store is a brand with a solid visual identity, a loyal customer base, and a validated operational structure ready for the next step: its first physical branch.

proyectos.descripcion_corta: Animal adoption SaaS. Hackathon Finalist (Top 20/200+) validating a B2B model for shelters.

detalle.descripcion_larga:
**The Challenge:** Adoption in Nicaragua suffered from a 'broken bridge': saturated shelters managing processes on paper and adopters lost in the chaos of social media. The team's challenge was to build, under Hackathon pressure, an integral solution that repaired this disconnection.

**The Solution:** We developed a dual ecosystem. While the engineering team built a robust SaaS for shelter management, **I led Product Design and Go-to-Market Strategy**, creating an empathetic interface and a business pitch that validated our proposal before the judges.

**The Result:** The project was selected as a finalist among +200 competitors. We managed to present a functional MVP that not only facilitates adoptions, but professionalizes the work of shelters, demonstrating that technology can have a real and scalable social impact.

media_showcase.caption: Visual Identity — Logo, palette, and iconography system
Brand Manual — Typography, usage, and restrictions

proyectos.descripcion_corta: Strategic visual production for high-profile Real Estate.

detalle.descripcion_larga:
**The Challenge:** In the real estate sector, image is everything. Eng. Giovanni Urbina, a KW agent, had a portfolio of high-value properties, but his visual presentation (cell phone photos) did not reflect the quality of the property nor the professionalism of his service, stalling deal closures.

**The Solution:** Execution of a superior visual standard. I performed professional photography and art direction for each property, replacing improvisation with an editorial aesthetic that highlights the best angles and the real added value of each space.

**The Result:** Immediate transformation of inventory perception. The new visual tools allowed the agent to differentiate himself within the franchise, generating greater trust in prospects and accelerating the sales process.

proyectos.descripcion_corta: Visual and operational professionalization for a brand with a +20 year track record.

detalle.descripcion_larga:
**The Challenge:** A solid hardware business with two decades of experience operating with an improvised image (logo in Word) that did not represent its real capacity. The lack of a visual system generated operational friction and made it difficult to apply the brand on new signage or uniforms.

**The Solution:** Development of a Functional Visual Identity. I converted their precarious assets into a professional vector system, designed high-impact facade signage, and optimized their price lists to streamline customer service and product recommendations.

**The Result:** A brand operational and ready for the future. Visual debt was eliminated, delivering to the company all the tools (vectors, palette, typography) to project trust and coherence in any physical or digital application.

media_showcase.caption: Visual Identity System — Logo, palette, and typography
Brand Manual — Usage, signage, and stationery

proyectos.descripcion_corta: Local Market Leadership: From 0 to 1,400+ digital members and massive organic reach.

detalle.descripcion_larga:
**The Challenge:** A gym with top-tier infrastructure that was digitally invisible. They needed to attract qualified members and communicate their premium value proposition without relying solely on referrals or paid advertising.

**The Solution:** Implementation of a high-impact digital identity and a community management (CM) system. I developed a constant visual content strategy and automated the response flow (DM Automation), ensuring that every interested party received immediate and complete information.

**The Result:** Construction of a loyal audience of +1,420 followers from scratch. We achieved peaks of local virality (+74k reach in events) and a constant flow of profile visits (2k-5k), converting organic traffic into real memberships thanks to systematized attention.

media_showcase.caption: Digital Identity and Social Media Management

proyectos.descripcion_corta: From homemade product to boutique brand: Asset professionalization.

detalle.descripcion_larga:
**The Challenge:** Social media competition requires more than just a good product. Energy had artisanal quality, but its visual presentation didn't reflect the true value of its pieces, limiting its ability to justify competitive pricing to an audience that buys with their eyes.

**The Solution:** Total professionalization of the graphic line. Developed the brand's visual universe (colors, fonts, logo variants) and executed commercial photography designed specifically to capture attention in the feed and close sales via WhatsApp.

**Result:** Immediate elevation of perceived value. The new graphic and photographic line allowed the brand to differentiate itself from informal competition, validating a price adjustment and strengthening its presence in the local digital market.

media_showcase.caption: Visual identity system — Palette, typography, and logo

proyectos.descripcion_corta: Technical visual identity: From emerging e-commerce to future physical store.

detalle.descripcion_larga:
**The Challenge:** Prime Tech, a technology business with high-value products (appliances, laptops), operated with an AI-generated image that limited its professional perception. The owner, with a clear vision of expanding into a physical branch, needed a graphic identity that worked today on digital screens but was ready for real applications like signage and embroidered uniforms.

**The Solution:** Development of a versatile, vector visual identity system. I designed a technical and clean graphic brand, optimized not only for WhatsApp avatars, but built with the standards required for its future application on facades and corporate clothing.

**The Result:** A brand armored for growth. The new identity immediately legitimized its current digital operation and gave the owner the professional assets needed to materialize his vision of opening the first physical store with a solid image from day one.

media_showcase.caption: Identity manual — Refined logo, palette, and typography
